title: Meet Marco Rubio, Trump’s likely Secretary of State, who wants India to be treated by US ‘like allies Israel, Japan
description: As Donald Trump builds his team for his return as US President, the name of Florida senator Marco Rubio is doing the rounds as the Secretary of State pick. If he is confirmed, Rubio will be the first Latino to hold the Secretary of State position in the US. While he is known for his hawkish approach to China, Iran, etc., he has expressed favourable views about India.Microsoft Office 2024 - Black Friday Sale Rubio was one of Trump's rivals for the Republican Party's Presidential candidate in the 2016 US elections. The two had heaped attacks and insults on each other then, but their ties have improved since. Rubio was also in the running for Trump's Vice Presidential candidate this time
author: jhon

article:
As Donald Trump builds his team for his return as US President, the name of Florida senator Marco Rubio is doing the rounds as the Secretary of State pick.

  •  If he is confirmed, Rubio will be the first Latino to hold the Secretary of State position in the US. 
  • While he is known for his hawkish approach to China, Iran, etc., 

  1. he has expressed favourable views about India.Microsoft Office 2024 - Black Friday Sale 
  2. Rubio was one of Trump's rivals for the Republican Party's Presidential candidate in the 2016 US elections.

 The two had heaped attacks and insults on each other then, but their ties have improved since. 

Rubio was also in the running for Trump's Vice Presidential candidate this time

title: Library-supported collections
description: We have a growing corpus of digital special collections published on JSTOR by our institutional partners. A collaboration with libraries to fund, source, digitize and publish open access primary source collections from under-represented voices.
author: shyam

commentDetails.comment: Article Rules for the definite article ‘The’

article:
We have a growing corpus of digital special collections published on JSTOR by our institutional partners.

  1. A collaboration with libraries to fund, source,
  2. digitize and publish open access primary
  3. source collections from under-represented voices.

Library-supported collections

title: JSTOR Daily
description: Is an online publication that contextualizes current events with scholarship. All of our stories contain links to publicly accessible research on JSTOR. We’re proud to publish articles based in fact and grounded by careful research and to provide free access to that research for all of our readers.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: Article Rules for the definite article ‘The’
An apple a day builds immunity.
I saw tigers in a zoo

article: Article ‘The’ is used when the listener knows what the speaker is talking about. The mangoes you kept in the refrigerator last night do not taste good. Did you complete all the homework?

title: Images and media
description: JSTOR hosts a growing number of public collections, including Artstor’s Open Access collections, from museums, archives, libraries, and scholars worldwide. Research reports : A curated set of more than 34,000 research reports from more than 140 policy institutes selected with faculty, librarian, and expert input.
author: hema

commentDetails.comment: The teacher she spoke to at the exhibition was very rude.

article: ‘The’ is used to generalize the whole class or group.The honest are respected. The beggars are not always needy. The is used for geographical points on the globe.

title: Journals
description: Explore our growing collection of Open Access journals Early Journal Content, articles published prior to the last 95 years in the United States, or prior to the last 143 years if initially published internationally, are freely available to all Even more content is available when you register to read – millions of articles from nearly 2,000 journals
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: He lost all the money borrowed from the lender.

article: The is used for the nouns that cannot be counted. The water in the Pacific ocean is freezing. Two robbers stole all the money from the bank.

title: Books
description: Thousands of Open Access ebooks are available from top scholarly publishers, including Brill, Cornell University Press, University College of London, and University of California Press – at no cost to libraries or users.This includes Open Access titles in Spanish:
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: Article ‘The’ is used when the listener knows what the speaker is talking about.

article: The is used with geographical nouns, depending on the size and plurality of the noun. ‘The’ must precede the names of oceans, rivers, group of islands, lakes, mountains, countries with united states or islands, etc.

title: misunderstand the goal of the assignment
description: The most common problem that students have when writing an article summary is that they misunderstand the goal of the assignment. In an article summary, your job is to write about the article, not about the actual topic of the article. For example, if you are summarizing Smith’s article about the causes of the Bubonic plague in Europe, your summary should be about Smith’s article: What does she want to find out about the plague? What evidence does she use? What is her argument? You are not writing a paper about the actual causes of Bubonic plague in Europe
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: The mangoes you kept in the refrigerator last night do not taste good.

article: Candidates can watch the video given below on the Article rules and concepts. This will help them to understand the concept and usage even better, along with the application of articles in the English language.

title: Sleeping with pain? This innovative product may just be what your body needs!
description: Waking up with a stiff neck and a hurting back is a terrible way to start your day. That’s where this product makes a huge difference! Here’s how. vNothing’s worse than turning, tossing, and turning again for 8 hours on your bed. And still not getting thirty minutes of uninterrupted quality sleep.Waking up in the morning starts to feel like a chore. Dark and heavy bags live under your eyes. You’re cranky. You’re unhappy. Productivity falls. It’s horrible!
author: hema

commentDetails.comment: The north pole and the south pole can never meet.

title: JSTOR Forum training: Project cataloging
description: Join us to learn the basics of cataloging in Forum. Learn how to catalog records individually and in bulk, access data from linked fields, and manage different types of media. JSTOR Forum training: Advanced features
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: Two robbers stole all the money from the bank.

article: For a better understanding of the formation of words in English and to know the English words that are asked in most of the competitive exams, visit the links provided below The article ‘a’ is used before a consonant word or any vowel with a consonant sound.

title: Picture this: Unlocking the cross-disciplinary potential of Artstor on JSTOR
description: Discover the value of Artstor on JSTOR for teaching and research across disciplines. In our webinar, explore tools, content, and strategies with Blair Woodard (Associate Professor of History and Environmental Studies, University of Portland) and Whitney Barlow Robles (Author, Historian, Curator, and Visiting Scholar, Department of History, Dartmouth College), and get practical tips on using images to enrich student learning.
author: ram

commentDetails.comment: Names of countries, states or streets like Alaska, Bolivia, New town street, etc.

article: Similarly, the article ‘an’ is used before the words beginning with a vowel (a, e, i, o, u) or the letter of a consonant word with a vowel sound. She is an innocent girl He is an honest man.

title: JSTOR Forum training: Advanced features
description: Join us for a look at Forum’s advanced functionality. Learn how to create and manage compilations and containers, and explore lists. Join us for a look at Forum’s advanced functionality. Learn how to create and manage compilations and containers, and explore lists.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: ‘The’ is mandatorily used for things that are only one of a kind in the universe.

article: A singular common noun always requires an article ‘a’ or ‘an’, but a plural common noun does not require any article or can have ‘the’ to particularise that noun

title: Charleston Library Conference 2024
description: Join us at Charleston 2024 to learn how you can be a part of defining the future of academic and research technologies. Visit our booth for the opportunity to take advantage of two groundbreaking initiatives!
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: For more English language topics discussing concepts, rules, lists and uses of General English for competitive exams, check the linked page.

article: A/An is used to make a Proper noun a common noun. Proper nouns do not take articles but to make them common nouns, a/an is used. I have seen the elephants again before leaving the zoo. (Refers particularly to the elephants of the zoo which were seen earlier.)

title: CONCERT 2024
description: Join us at the CONCERT Annual Meeting on November 14-15, 2024, where Roger Schonfeld will deliver a keynote on “Innovation and Shared Infrastructure in the Adoption of AI”. We’ll also share insights on Project Odyssey, a new AI tool to help libraries process digital collections efficiently by automating metadata creation.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: Candidates can watch the video given below on the Article rules and concepts

article: A/An is used to make a Proper noun a common noun. Proper nouns do not take articles but to make them common nouns, a/an is used.He thinks he is an Abraham Lincon. (not referring to the actual person but someone like him)

title: Not just another AI session
description: JSTOR’s collaborative and tech-driven solutions for digital collections stewardship Charleston Library Conference Join our session to explore JSTOR’s tech-driven solutions for managing digitization, metadata, and preservation. We’ll showcase tools like automated metadata creation and expanded preservation services to help institutions optimize digital collections.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: The article ‘a’ is used before a consonant word or any vowel with a consonant sound.

article: She is an Indian. (India is a proper noun but ‘Indian’ is a common noun) Indefinite article ‘a’ or ‘an’ is used to refer to numbers sometimes. Aspirants of various government exams can check important topics for English language preparation

title: Continuing the journey on a path to open: An innovative model for open access monograph publishing
description: Join this free, one-hour webinar to learn how JSTOR, along with founding partner ACLS and members of the scholarly community , is advancing sustainable open access models. Gain valuable insights into the progress, achievements, and what we have learned so far from the Path to Open pilot program. Register now to secure your spot and learn how you can join us on the path to open.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: Similarly, the article ‘an’ is used before the words beginning with a vowel (a, e, i, o, u) or the letter of a consonant word with a vowel sound.

As Donald Trump builds his team for his return as US President, the name of Florida senator Marco Rubio is doing the rounds as the Secretary of State pick.

  •  If he is confirmed, Rubio will be the first Latino to hold the Secretary of State position in the US. 
  • While he is known for his hawkish approach to China, Iran, etc., 

  1. he has expressed favourable views about India.Microsoft Office 2024 - Black Friday Sale

title: Navigating Generative AI: Early Findings and Implications for Research, Teaching, and Learning
description: Starting in mid-2023, ITHAKA began investing in and engaging directly with generative AI in two broad areas: a generative AI research tool on the JSTOR platform and a collaborative research project led by Ithaka S+R. In this presentation, Kevin Guthrie (President, ITHAKA) and Beth LaPensee (Senior Product Manager, JSTOR) share early signals about how this technology-enabled evolution is beginning to take shape.
author: jhon

commentDetails.comment: A singular common noun always requires an article ‘a’ or ‘an’, but a plural common noun does not require any article or can have ‘the’ to particularise that noun.

article: Correct – The girls in my hostel like to play kabaddi. (the sentence is specifically talking about girls of the hostel) The Water scarcity in my locality is a problem. (talking about specific locality) Incorrect – There is a water scarcity in my locality. (here again, scarcity is uncountable) For more such differences between confused English words, concepts, subjects and topics, candidates cam check 100 difference Between Articles on the given link.
